titles.title: I Will Sing Of My Redeemer

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Sing, oh sing, of my Redeemer. newline With His blood He purchased me. newline On the cross He sealed my pardon, newline Paid the debt and made me free.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I will sing of my Redeemer, newline And His wondrous love to me. newline On the cruel cross He suffered, newline From the curse to set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will tell the wondrous story, newline How my lost estate to save, newline In His boundless love and mercy newline He the ransom freely gave.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I will praise my dear Redeemer; newline His triumphant power I'll tell, newline How the victory He giveth newline Over sin and death and hell.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I will sing of my Redeemer newline And His heavenly love to me; newline He from death to life hath brought me, newline Son of God, with Him to be.
